name: Firezone
headline: Easiest, most secure way to set up Zero Trust Access for your team
description:
Firezone connects your workforce to the computing resources they need, wherever they are, securely. Unlike traditional VPNs, Firezone uses a least-privileged approach to access control known as Zero Trust Access.

Connect your identity provider and define granular policies in minutes, then rejoice in the IT support requests you won't receive due to our lightweight, WireGuard-powered clients which work great on all platforms.
tags: industry:devsecops; industry:next-gen-network-security; industry:b2b; industry:security; industry:open-source; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jamil Bou Kheir, Founder
founders.description:
Previous:
8 years at Cisco as a security engineer in various capacities.
4 years as a fullstack contractor building web apps for startups.
2 years building and traveling in my tiny hacker house (pics: https://imgur.com/a/ujsmGH7).

# Upgrade your VPN to zero-trust access
Firezone is a fast, flexible VPN replacement built on WireGuard® that protects your most valuable resources without tedious configuration.
[Get started for free](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/app.firezone.dev/sign_up>)
[Book a demo](https://www.firezone.dev/</contact/sales>)
Backed by ![yc logo gray](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fyc-logo-gray.png&w=256&q=75) and trusted by hundreds of organizations
[![corrdyn logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-corrdyn-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/corrdyn.com>)[![square1 logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-square1-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/square1.io>)[![bunq logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-bunq-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/bunq.com>)[![wolfram logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-wolfram-gray.svg&w=128&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/wolfram.com>)[![teracloud logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-teracloud-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/teracloud.com>)[![double11 logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-double11-gray.svg&w=128&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/double11.co.uk>)
[![corrdyn logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-corrdyn-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/corrdyn.com>)[![square1 logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-square1-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/square1.io>)[![bunq logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-bunq-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/bunq.com>)[![wolfram logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-wolfram-gray.svg&w=128&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/wolfram.com>)[![teracloud logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-teracloud-gray.svg&w=256&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/teracloud.com>)[![double11 logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogos%2Fcust-logo-double11-gray.svg&w=128&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/double11.co.uk>)
###### Stay Connected
### Eliminate ACL hell
Firezone secures apps, services, and networks with simple access policies that are manageable by mere humans.
Fast and lightweight.
Built on WireGuard® to be 3-4x faster than OpenVPN.
Scales with your business.
Automatic load balancing and failover with two or more Gateways.
Minimize your attack surface.
Firezone's hole-punching tech hides your resources from the internet.
Open source for full transparency.
Our entire product is open-source, allowing anyone to audit the codebase.
![Elevator pitch graphic](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Felevator-pitch.png&w=1080&q=75)
![Syncs with your identity provider](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeature-syncs-with-idp.png&w=1080&q=75)
###### Stay secure
### Syncs with your identity provider
Users and groups automatically sync with your identity provider, making onboarding and offboarding a breeze.
[Set up directory sync](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/authenticate/directory-sync>)
###### Stay compliant
### More control  over your network
Restrict access based on realtime conditions like device location, time of day, and more, and view every authorized connection by user, resource, or policy.
[See supported conditions](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/deploy/policies#conditional-access-policies>)
![Policy conditions](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpolicy-conditions.png&w=1200&q=75)
###### Flexible security
### Runs everywhere your business does
[macOS](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/macos-client>)
[Windows](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/windows-gui-client>)
[Linux](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/linux-gui-client>)
[Android](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/android-client>)
[ChromeOS](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/android-client>)
[iOS](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps/ios-client>)
Clients are available for every major platform, require no configuration, and stay connected even when switching WiFi networks.
[Download Client apps](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/client-apps>)
![Gateway](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fdocker.svg&w=640&q=75)
![Gateway](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fterraform.svg&w=640&q=75)
![Gateway](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fkubernetes.svg&w=640&q=75)
![Gateway](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpulumi.svg&w=640&q=75)
```
**FIREZONE_TOKEN**=<your-token> \ ./**firezone-gateway**
```

Gateways are lightweight Linux binaries you deploy anywhere you need access. Just configure a token with your preferred tool and you're done.
[Deploy your first Gateway](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/deploy/gateways>)
###### Open source
### Open source for transparency and trust
How can you trust a zero-trust solution if you can't see its source? We build Firezone in the open so anyone can make sure it does exactly what we claim it does, and nothing more.
![Firezone stars](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.star-history.com%2Fsvg%3Frepos%3Dfirezone%2Ffirezone%26type%3DDate&w=1920&q=75)
[![ROSS Index - Fastest Growing Open-Source Startups in Q2 2022 | Runa Capital](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Frunacap.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2022%2F07%2FROSS_badge_black_Q2_2022.svg&w=640&q=75)](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/runacap.com/ross-index/q2-2022/>)
[Leave us a star](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/www.github.com/firezone/firezone>)
### Customers us,
### and we love them back.
[Book a demo](https://www.firezone.dev/</contact/sales>)
"Firezone's easy-to-setup, sleek, and simple interface makes management effortless. It perfectly met our zero-trust security needs without the complexity found in other products we tested."
![author portrait](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fportrait-mark-sim.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Mark Sim
Technical Account Manager, [Beakon](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/beakon.com.au/>)
"When producing live broadcasts for Fortune 500 companies security is of the utmost importance. We therefore selected Firezone for its robust WireGuard-based architecture. The flexible policy system and simple & clean user experience make Firezone the best fitting product for us in the market after trying several other solutions like Tailscale, OpenVPN, and Nebula."
![author portrait](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fportrait-robert-buisman.png&w=128&q=75)
Robert Buisman
CEO, [NOMOBO](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/www.nomobo.tv/>)
"After comparing Tailscale, we ultimately chose Firezone to secure access to our data warehouses. Firezone's ease of configuration and robust policy-based access system made it the clear choice for our needs."
![author portrait](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fportrait-james-winegar.png&w=128&q=75)
James Winegar
CEO, [Corrdyn](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/www.corrdyn.com/>)
###### Use cases
### One product. Endless possibilities. Zero hassle.
#### Scale access to cloud resources.
Eliminate throughput bottlenecks that plague other VPNs. Firezone's load-balancing architecture scales horizontally to handle an unlimited number of connections to even the most bandwidth-intensive services.
[Scale your security](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/use-cases/scale-vpc-access>)
![Resource List](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fresource-list.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Two-Factor Graphic](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftwo-factor-graphic.png&w=640&q=75)
#### Add two-factor auth to WireGuard.
Looking for 2FA for WireGuard? Look no further. Firezone integrates with any OIDC-compatible identity provider to consistently enforce multi-factor authentication across your workforce.
[Connect your identity provider](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/authenticate>)
![Manage access to SaaS graphic](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmanage-access-saas.png&w=828&q=75)
#### Manage access to a SaaS app
Manage access to a third-party SaaS app like HubSpot or GitHub.
[Configure your app](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/use-cases/saas-app-access>)
![Access on-prem network graphic](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Faccess-onprem-network.png&w=640&q=75)
#### Access an on-prem network
Firezone securely punches through firewalls with ease, so keep those ports closed. Connections pick the shortest path and your attack surface is minimized, keeping your most sensitive resources invisible to attackers.
[Set up secure access](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/use-cases/private-network-access>)
#### Block malicious DNS
Use Firezone to improve your team's Internet security by blocking DNS queries to known malicious domains.
[Secure your DNS](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/use-cases/secure-dns>)
![Block Malicious DNS](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fblock-malicious-dns.png&w=1200&q=75)
![Private web app graphic](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Faccess-private-web-app.png&w=828&q=75)
#### Access a private web app
Secure access to a privately hosted web application like GitLab or Metabase.
[Secure your web app](https://www.firezone.dev/</kb/use-cases/web-app-access>)
###### Compare
### More features for less
See how Firezone stacks up against the competition.
  * Automatic NAT64 and NAT46
  * Open source
  * Built on WireGuard®
  * IPv6 support
  * DNS-based routing


  * ![Firezone Logo](https://www.firezone.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogo-text-light.svg&w=384&q=75)
  * [Book a demo](https://www.firezone.dev/</contact/sales>)


  * Tailscale
  * Partial
  * Partial


  * Twingate


 _Last updated: 07/14/2024_

Give your organization the protection it deserves.
[Book a demo](https://www.firezone.dev/</contact/sales>)
Get a personalized walkthrough.
[Try Firezone for free](https://www.firezone.dev/<https:/app.firezone.dev/sign_up>)
No credit card required.

generated_description:
**Firezone Overview**

Firezone is a B2B cybersecurity startup founded in 2021, operating out of Mountain View, California. It made its debut in the Y Combinator Batch W22. The company's mission is clear and ambitious: to provide the easiest and most secure way to set up Zero Trust Access for remote teams. 

At its core, Firezone is a next-gen VPN replacement that leverages a Zero Trust framework to secure access to computing resources. Unlike traditional VPNs which often expose systems to unnecessary risks, Firezone employs a least-privileged access model, ensuring that users connect only to the services and data they absolutely need— no more, no less.

**Key Features and Offerings**

1. **Zero Trust Architecture**: By adopting a Zero Trust approach, Firezone minimizes potential attack surfaces and safeguards critical business resources. Users must authenticate at every step, ensuring that access is meticulously controlled.

2. **Adaptable and Lightweight Clients**: Firezone’s clients are driven by WireGuard technology, making them faster than conventional VPNs (3-4 times faster than OpenVPN). They require minimal configuration and run seamlessly across macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, iOS, and ChromeOS.

3. **Easy Integration and Configuration**: With Firezone, teams can quickly connect their identity providers and create granular access policies in just minutes. This streamlined process reduces IT burden and enhances productivity.

4. **Open Source**: The entire platform is open-source, providing full transparency and enabling users to audit the codebase. This commitment to openness assists in building trust in an industry where confidence is paramount.

5. **Flexible Access Control**: Firezone allows organizations to set access restrictions based on real-time parameters including device location and time of day. This agility enhances compliance and ensures that sensitive data remains secure.

6. **Community and Support**: Being part of the vibrant Y Combinator network and gaining traction among notable clients—like Corrdyn and NOMOBO—gives Firezone credibility and a robust support system as it navigates growth.

**Conclusion**

With a compact team of six dedicated employees, Firezone is positioning itself to revolutionize how teams connect securely. By eliminating the complexities associated with traditional VPNs and emphasizing ease of use alongside stringent security measures, Firezone is not just another player in the cybersecurity sphere—it's aiming to redefine the landscape entirely.

For those interested in exploring more, the company’s website [Firezone.dev](https://www.firezone.dev) provides documentation, pricing, and the opportunity to book a demo or start using their solution for free. In a world increasingly reliant on remote work, the importance of secure and efficient access solutions cannot be overstated. Firezone embodies the spirit of innovation needed to meet these challenges head-on.
